flawed_nl_solution:
She will keep 1000000 / 2 = <<1000000/2=5000000.0>>5000000.0 Safe Moon tokens for herself.
For the remaining siblings, they will each receive 5000000.0 / 4 = <<5000000.0/4=1250000.0>>1250000.0 tokens.
This means that Sandy will have 5000000.0 - 1250000.0 = <<5000000.0-1250000.0=3750000.0>>3750000.0 tokens more than any of her siblings.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 500000.0, not 5000000.0. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
